title: New Pixel 2 phone. Locked in boot up screen with "ERROR: Slot Unbootable: Load Error"
content: Purchased new 8th Feb, set up by EE shop initially ok.  Rebooted following auto Pixel software update.  Now unable to boot from Error screen.  Options tried 1. "Start" - returns to same Error screen.  2. "Retstart bootloader" - returns to same Error screen with "Device State: locked". 3.  "Download mode" returns to same Error screen with "Operation Denied".  4. Recovery mode" - Returns to same Error screen.  5. "Power off" - successfully powers off but returns to same Error screen when restarted with holding power button in. 5. tried restarting power button whilst pressing volume - same Error screen.
